messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 5159
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/6/2005 4:28:38 AM Central Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: I just  had a thought of starting a homeschooling
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/6/2005 4:28:38 AM Central Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

I just had a thought of starting a homeschooling program to where we
could bring in a student from the country we're learning about that
year and really get submerged in to the language.


I like your entrepeneur spirit!!! This is a great idea. From what I read,
you are actually doing an "exchange student" in reverse. The student would
come with the purpose of speaking his native language and absorbing America
through home education families instead of ps. Is your organization already
formed? If so, please email me the FAQ's. If you are still in the planning
stages, please keep me on your mailing list.

Pamela
Spc in Mo


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
